snippet.title: Where Winds Meet - Official Extended Gameplay Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Check out Everstone Games’ open-world martial arts game, Where Winds Meet. Set in the Ten Kingdoms, where the entire dynasty is on the brink of crumbling, you take on the role of a swordsman who has grown up during war and conflict. Using skills from various Martial Arts Schools, it’s up to you to build your own combat style and survive. Get a look at this new Where Winds Meet gameplay, featuring the game’s exciting combat, abilities in action, and more.
